title: Interpretation of a dream about someone killing me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone killing me in a dream is one of the most heinous acts that coincide with killing a soul unjustly. God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about killing me in a dream. A married woman’s vision of someone killing her in a dream is a warning of marital strife in her life that may lead to separation, and God knows best. Seeing someone she knows killing him in a dream is a sign of this person’s hatred for the student and he must beware of him. In a dream: Whoever sees someone killing him There may be a great benefit to the student from that person, according to some interpreters. When a girl sees that someone she knows wants to kill her, this is a sign that this person wants to marry her. Whoever is going through financial difficulties when he sees someone killing him, this is a sign that he will be exempt from The financial problems he is going through, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about killing a child in a dream When a married man sees that he is killing a child in a dream, this is a sign of the husband’s intense love for his wife. Killing a child in a dream can mean victory over enemies in a dream, thanks to God Almighty. If a mother sees In her dream that she killed her son, this is a sign that she will sever her relationship with her family and friends, which is an unpleasant vision. Seeing the death of a child in a dream may indicate that he will face problems and difficulties in the next period of his life. And when he sees a dead child being born in a dream, this indicates that he committed Many sins for which he must repent to God, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about killing in self-defense in a dream: Killing in self-defense in a dream indicates that he always stands up to injustice and cannot remain silent when he talks about a tendency. A married woman who dreams that she Being killed in defense of herself is a sign of unhappiness in her married life. Anyone who dreams of being killed in self-defense feels persecuted by those around him in his social life. Whoever suffers from problems and fears of killing in self-defense shows that he has gotten rid of the problems and worries that he was experiencing and that he He is in control of his life. A common girl who believes that she is killing to defend her honor and herself in a dream is evidence that God will give her the right person to marry, God willing. Seeing killing in self-defense may indicate that the human condition has changed for the better and that God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of Dreams : I killed someone I did not know in a dream. When an ordinary girl dreams that she is killing someone she does not know, this is evidence of the psychological pressures that the girl is exposed to and that affect her life during this period. In a dream, seeing someone killing an unknown person can indicate fears and problems. Which a person goes through in the next period of his life. Killing an unknown person in a dream may mean getting rid of some of his bad qualities. Sometimes killing an unknown person with a knife in a dream indicates hasty decisions taken by the dreamer that negatively affect his life. Killing someone you do not know with a knife indicates actions... It is a mistake that a person does towards others, and this must stop, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about attempted murder in a dream: When someone sees that there are unknown people who want to kill him, this is an indication of the psychological conflict that the person with the vision is suffering from.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its repercussions

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its meanings. Dates are a type of fruit that he saw in a dream, in addition to a symptom, based on the type and color of dates that we see in the dream. In this article, we will learn in detail about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who dreams of seeing dates in a dream. And its repercussions.Interpretation of the dream of seeing dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its repercussions. Dates. Interpretation of the dream of seeing dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its repercussions. It is also: It is worth noting that the scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing dates in a dream. It is a sign of the closeness of relief to God Almighty and that all the pain and sorrow that the dreamer goes through It will actually disappear. In addition to whoever sees a date tree in a dream. This vision is evidence of the high status granted to whoever sees this dream, and this is by God’s command, and it is also evidence of the patient’s recovery. Whereas if a person sees many yellow dates in his dream. This dream is evidence On many changes in the dreamer’s life, whether he is a man or a woman. In addition, seeing wet dates in a dream is a sign of the abundance of healthy and halal food. Likewise, whoever saw red dates in a dream. This is good news about happiness and psychological and family peace. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing maftool or couscous in a dream and its repercussions. Interpretation of a dream about a wet date for a married woman. Seeing dates in a dream includes many interpretations, as their difference depends on the type of dates we see in the dream, and these are the interpretations that have been explained by many scholars and dream interpretation experts, and during these The lines we will explain. The interpretation of a dream about a wet date for a married woman is also: If a married woman sees wet dates in a dream. This vision is a sign of great goodness, and abundant money that will come to the dreamer, her husband, and her home. Also, this vision of wet dates in a dream for a married woman. It will be a sign On the dream or desire that he longed for, because it will come true in the near future, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Whereas if a married woman dreams of wet dates on her. This vision is a sign of the newborn coming to God. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing seeds in a dream from the most famous Scholars of the complete interpretation of seeing a date in a dream for a single woman. Of course seeing it in a dream has many meanings and signs. It varies according to the condition of the viewer, whether social or psychological. There are many scholars and interpretation experts who have clarified these connotations, and with this we explain the interpretation of seeing dates in a dream for a single woman. Also: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is eating dates. This vision is an indication that she will soon marry a man with a high status. Also, if an unmarried girl dreams of new dates. This dream is an indication of weakness that will soon be, It also indicates the removal of fears. In addition, if he sees red dates in a dream. This is evidence of good news and evidence of the work that you will obtain, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. In addition to that, seeing an unmarried woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a scooter in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a scooter in a dreamInterpretation of dreamsSeeing Riding a scooter in a dream is evidence that the dreamer needs to spend some time on himself and having fun. Also, to see yourself riding a scooter in a dream and walking on it, this indicates achieving goals and achieving success for the dreamer. Seeing yourself falling from A motorcycle in a dream means that the dreamer will face some problems and obstacles in his next life. Seeing yourself riding an electric motorcycle in a dream is one of the visions of success, success, and reaching the highest positions. Dream of the Al-Osaimi CyclistInterpretation of seeing a bicycle in a dream by Al-Osaimi, and this indicates achieving Success in the future and the fulfillment of desires. Seeing a bicycle in a dream is evidence that God is warning the dreamer against following the path of guidance and approaching Him. Seeing a bicycle in a dream also means success in life and the dreamer will achieve many goals. Also, seeing a bicycle in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get rid of Of the difficulties he faces and ends up with his problems. Interpretation of a dream about riding a bicycle in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a bicycle in a dream indicates that the dreamer is entering a new life full of happiness. Seeing the same man riding a bicycle in his dream means that he needs to reorganize and arrange his life. Riding a bicycle with a woman in a dream is for single people It is one of the praiseworthy visions and an indication of his imminent marriage. Interpretation of a dream about riding a black motorcycle. Interpretation of seeing a black motorcycle in a dream indicates good relationships with loved ones. Seeing a stolen motorcycle in a dream also indicates gossip, bad speech, and bad speech. Also, seeing a stolen bike in a dream indicates The dream indicates deception and deception and is a sign of betrayal. Seeing a motorcycle traveling quickly in a dream and the dreamer is afraid means impulsiveness and recklessness and the dreamer must be careful. Interpretation of a dream about falling on a motorcycle in a dream is one of the unwanted visions and indicates misfortunes and disasters. The dream of riding in a car with someone you love is considered a praiseworthy dream and indicates kindness and happiness between them. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of dreams: Seeing a sweeper in a dream...problems and sins

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see sweeping in a dream.. stumbling and committing sins. Sweeping is a type of cleanliness where dust and dirt are removed from the house using a broom, but the appearance of sweeping in a dream is a confusing vision, knowing its meaning and interpretation, so we will review for you what the dream interpreters mentioned in detail about cleaning. And sweeping in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about chicks in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sweeping in a dream for one girl. If an unmarried girl sees herself sweeping in a dream, she will get rid of the bad friends present in her life at that time. Sweeping in a dream can be one of the signs that indicates getting rid of The worries, problems, and problems that the dreamer is suffering from. If the dreamer is currently committing some sins and forbidden acts, then seeing her sweeping in a dream means that this girl will get rid of the sins she is currently committing and return to God. Sweeping a female student in a dream could be one of the signs that these The girl has finished her studies and obtained excellent grades in her studies this year. Sweeping a house A married woman is one of the signs that the dreamer has gotten rid of the illness or health crises that he is currently experiencing. If this woman is suffering from any problems with her family or neighbors, then wiping is one of the signs that these problems have ended. Imam Al-Sadiq claims that wiping a married woman in a dream indicates Freedom from marital problems and disagreements with the husband or children. Interpretation of a dream about surrender in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sweeping in a dream for a pregnant woman. Wiping in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the signs that this woman will soon get rid of the pain of pregnancy and the approaching birth, God willing. Wiping may be one of the signs that indicate... Escaping from the envy and hatred that prevails in some of the souls surrounding this woman. If the pregnant woman is suffering from some problems in her life, whether with her husband or with one of his relatives, then wiping in a dream is one of the signs that indicate the end of these problems and getting rid of them. Sweeping a debtor in a dream is a sign that this person will get rid of the debts and financial crises that he suffers from during this period. Sweeping in a man’s dream indicates that he will get rid of the enemies who are trying to harm this man. Sweeping in a dream may be The man is one of the signs that indicates getting rid of the worries, sorrow, and pain that the dreamer is suffering from. Sweeping may be an expression of overcoming some problems that concern this person’s children. title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive. There is more than one interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive. Seeing the dead in a dream while they are alive causes a lot of anxiety, but the truth is that seeing the dead in a dream while they are alive carries many meanings and symbols. Seeing a dead person in a dream while they are alive can be a sign of something positive or negative for the person. Also, the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive depends on the condition of the person who has the vision and the condition of the deceased. Seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive is usually a message from the subconscious about something that we choose to ignore or refuse to accept. Seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive may indicate an inability to accept the reality of losing someone forever, sadness and longing for the dead person. It can also indicate feelings of guilt or remorse for not resolving some issues with the deceased. Also, seeing the deceased alive is a symbol of change or transformation in life and a symbol of a new beginning and a new beginning in life. It is possible that the interpretation of seeing the deceased in a dream while he is alive is that the deceased carries a specific message for you. For example, seeing a dead person in a dream while he is still alive and silent means that the deceased wants the dreamer to give charity or provide a favor in this world. Meanings of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is aliveInterpretation of seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive Life: Seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive means many things. Seeing a father in a dream often means protection, authority, independence, and decision-making. Seeing a father in a dream can mean that you need these qualities. Another meaning of seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive is longing for the father, even years after his death. Interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream while she is alive: The mother is a symbol of care, worry, and worry. Seeing a dead mother in a dream while she is alive is evidence that you lack these qualities in your life. Seeing a dead mother in a dream while she is alive means that you miss a mother or that you lack these qualities in life. If you see a dead mother in a dream while she is alive, this may bring you some happy and promising news. Interpretation of seeing a dead brother in a dream while she is alive: To see a dead brother in a dream while she is alive means improvement and development for the better, getting rid of problems and worries, and coming At a better time than before. Also, seeing a dead brother alive in a dream means that you are about to enter a period of joy and success in life. Seeing a dead brother in a dream while he is alive may indicate a good ending for him. Interpretation of seeing the dead person in a dream while he is alive by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the dead person in a dream while he is alive by Ibn Sirin is that seeing the dead person alive and existing naturally in Life is like everyone else, meaning that the dreamer is taking the right path

title: Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing that being tired of a bed in a dream shows good conditions for the dreamer, and breaking it shows the difficulty of life. Also, seeing a married man’s bed indicates that he will be blessed with good offspring, that he will be a lost child, and is an indication of sustenance and abundance. Seeing a bed in a dream indicates the marriage of an unmarried girl if she buys it, and it indicates that she will enter a new job, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she sees an evil religion, this indicates the end of her worries and the approaching date of her marriage to a man. Saleh. The dream of a bed indicates the dreamer’s stability and stability, and it also indicates the success and excellence that an unmarried girl will achieve. Seeing a bed mattress indicates following an extensive diet, the end of sorrows and problems, and the beginning of a new life with God and good intentions. Seeing a dismantled sect in a dream may indicate On the enemies around her, and also shows a lot of trouble and the need for money, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees a dream in her bed, this indicates her faith in Almighty God and also shows family happiness. Also, seeing a bed in a dream means worship Good deeds, achieving what you want, and achieving the hopes you are trying to obtain. Seeing a bed in a dream shows the stability of a married woman’s life and also shows the happiness that she will see in her life and her pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing a bed, this means that her due date is approaching, As well as an easy and easy birth. This vision also indicates the death of her worries and her spacious life, and her husband has given birth to a beautiful child free of all diseases. Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream for a man: If a person sees in his dream that he is buying a bed, this indicates his close marriage to a very good and suitable girl, by God. I know. Also, seeing a broken bed indicates that a man needs a lot of money to get rid of his anxiety and get rid of his worries and problems. Also, this vision indicates the collapse of the dreamer’s worries and indicates that he will join a new job or an abundant livelihood from where he does not expect, and God knows best. Interpretation Seeing an old bed in a dream: If a person sees in his dream that he is sitting or sleeping on the old bed, this indicates the dreamer’s fear of something that will be revealed and revealed and revealed. This vision also shows the difficulty of life, as it shows instability and a malignant disease that afflicts the dreamer and he will not be saved except by death. If he You have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.
preview.text: Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says that seeing fatigue from the bed in a dream shows the good conditions of the dreamer and breaking it shows the difficulty of life. Also, seeing a married man’s bed indicates that he enjoys good offspring, and that he is a lost son, and indicates sustenance and abundance. Also, seeing a bed in a dream indicates the marriage of an unmarried girl if she buys it, and indicates her entry into a new job, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she sees the religion of evil, this indicates the end of her worries and the approaching date of her marriage to a righteous man. The dream of a bed indicates the stability and stability of the dreamer, and it also indicates the success and excellence that the unmarried girl will achieve. Seeing a bed mattress indicates following a wide diet, the end of sorrows and problems, and the beginning of a new life with God and her good intentions. Seeing a disintegrated sect in a dream may indicate enemies around her, and also shows a lot of troubles and the need for money, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees a dream in her bed This indicates her faith in Almighty God and also shows the happiness of the family. Also, seeing a bed in a dream means good worship, achieving what is desired, and achieving the hopes that she is trying to obtain. Seeing a bed in a dream shows the stability of a married woman’s life and also shows the happiness that she will see in her life and pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing a bed, this means that her due date is approaching, as well as an easy and easy birth. This vision also indicates the death of her worries and her wide life, and her husband gave birth to a beautiful child free of all diseases. Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream for a man If a person sees in his dream that he is buying a bed, this indicates his close marriage to a very good and suitable girl, and God knows best. Also, seeing a broken bed indicates that a man needs a lot of money to get rid of his anxiety and get rid of his worries and problems. This vision also indicates the collapse of the dreamer’s worries and indicates that he will join a new job or abundant livelihood from where he does not expect, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an old bed in a dream If a person sees in his dream that he is sitting or sleeping on an old bed, this indicates the dreamer’s fear of something that will be revealed and revealed And it is revealed. This vision also shows the difficulty of life, as it shows instability and a malignant disease that afflicts the dreamer and he will not survive except by death. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing a person wearing white clothes in a dream in detail

preview.html: When you see white clothes in a dream, it indicates the happiness that comes to a person, and to see someone wearing white clothes, it is a sign of relief from worries and getting rid of distress, and it also shows comfort and happiness, and this is for living. Interpretation of seeing someone wearing white clothes in a dream for a single girl can be The interpretation is that if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is seeing someone, but she did not know him before, then she is wearing white and he looks handsome. This may indicate that her good and good life and the goodness that will fill her, God willing, and that she will witness happy days. It also explains that if An unmarried girl saw in a dream that she was having a very important conversation with a person wearing white clothes in a dream, and she knows this person well. This may mean that he will do his best to get what he wants. But God will make it easy for her to do her job and she will get what she wants. He explains Also, if an unmarried girl dreams that she is the person most dressed in white in a dream and she is trying to talk to him. But she cannot, this indicates the abundance of goodness and sustenance for her, God willing. You may be interested: Interpretation of riding a train with someone in a dream Interpretation of seeing a person wearing white clothes In a dream for a married woman, it can be interpreted that if a married woman sees in a dream that she sees a person wearing white clothes, his appearance is not very beautiful and she tries to look at him well. For her to meet him, this portends goodness that will come to her family. But days of tension will come and they will go away, but happiness will remain, God willing. It can also indicate that if the married woman who dreams is facing some problems in her life and is trying hard to fix things and sees someone wearing white clothes in the dream. This indicates that God Almighty will save her from all these problems, God willing. It explains that if a married woman dreams To see her husband wearing a white robe in a dream. This indicates the goodness that he will receive. Interpretation of seeing a person wearing white clothes in a dream about a man and its meaning. It explains that if he sees in his dream that he is wearing a white robe and another person is wearing it, and his appearance is beautiful and harmonious. This indicates loss. And food, which will be the source of the needy, God willing. It explains that if a man dreams that he sees a woman he did not know before and looks at her wearing a white dress. This indicates that God will improve his lot, God willing. It also explains that if a man sees in a dream that his sister She is wearing a white robe and her appearance is beautiful. This indicates the good that will come to his family, God willing, in the near future. Read also: Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of seeing a person suddenly disappear in a dream. The meaning and interpretation of seeing a person wearing white in a pregnant woman’s dream. It explains that if a pregnant woman dreams that she will see her husband He wears a beautiful white robe. This indicates the goodness that will come to her husband and to her very soon. This can also be interpreted that if a pregnant woman dreams that she sees her mother wearing white in a dream. This indicates the goodness and contentment that this woman will receive, God willing. It also explains that if The woman saw the snake

title: Interpretation of seeing Satan and the jinn in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing the devil and the jinn in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream of the devil is one of the disturbing dreams that spreads a spirit of terror and fear for those who see the dream and want to know the interpretation of this dream, because it carries many connotations and interpretations, and in general all interpreters agreed. Seeing the devil in a dream is a dream that does not indicate good or evil. The devil is the enemy of man until the Day of Resurrection, and he deviates with disobedience and deviation from the path of guidance and obedience to distract him from prayer and lead him to sins and out of obedience to God and His obedience. It has no meaning or interpretation. Interpretation of seeing the devil in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees the devil and seeks knowledge in a dream, this indicates that he did not seek knowledge. I explained Ibn Sirin's vision of the devil in a dream. The owner of the dream is far from the path of guidance and worship, and he is busy with worldly affairs. Whoever sees in his dream that he has turned into a devil, this indicates that he is cunning and has mastered the art of planning for others. Whoever sees him inside the witch's dream, this means that you are holding on to money and worldly pleasures and losing happiness. Anyone who sees the devil standing at the door of his house indicates a vow that has not yet been fulfilled. I dream that I see the devil in a dream. Seeing the devil in a dream means a great loss in one's life. Whoever sees in his dream that the devil enters his house, this indicates that thieves will enter the house. Whoever sees this in his dream? The devil around him whispers to him, this indicates that the dreamer has a lot of disobedience and disobedience. Whoever sees in his dream that the devil is in a state of joy and happiness, this indicates that the owner of the dream is the one who seeks the pleasures of the world and forgets the afterlife. Whoever believes That? The devil teaches him to speak and this is evidence that he will spread rumors and slander among people. The dream of devils and demons bodes well and whoever dreams that he stands before a group of jinn and demons and teaches them the Qur’an, this indicates his benevolence, and shows that he has occupied a high position in his country. Interpretation of a dream about the devil for a married woman A lady who sees in a dream the devil taking off her clothes and taking off her clothes, this indicates separation between the spouses. Interpretation of killing the devil in a dream Who saw this in his dream? Kill the devil This indicates that the owner of the dream is a righteous person and will save people from evil from the test of the Antichrist and the Antichrist. Whoever sees the devil chained in a dream This indicates the victory of the owner of the dream over the enemies. Interpretation of the touch of the devil in a dream Who saw this in his dream? The touch of the denim This indicates that there are enemies who wish him harm and destruction. In the end, we have shown you all the possible interpretations of seeing the devil, demons and jinn in a dream. Anyone who has a vision that he would like to explain, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with the explanation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a deer in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of a dream about a deer in a dream by Al-Osaimi in detail A deer in a dream refers to many situations that the dreamer goes through, whether he is a man or a woman, resembling a deer in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a deer in a dream Al-Osaimi Interpretation of dreams Deer in a dream It represents the beginning of a new life full of goodness and happiness. As for seeing a deer in a dream This indicates that he will get married soon. But if a person sees deer antlers in a dream, this is evidence of a decent personality. As for seeing deer antlers in different shapes in a dream, this is a bad omen and an unpleasant dream. Interpretation of a dream about a deer in a single woman’s dreamIf an unmarried girl sees a deer In a dream, this indicates her lover. A deer in a dream shows a girl’s honor and kindness. As for an unmarried girl who sees the blood of a deer in her dream, this is a sign that if she follows it, she will marry her lover. Eating deer meat in a dream indicates an abundance of food and many good things. Interpretation of a dream Deer for a married woman: A deer in a married woman’s dream is a sign of happiness and good luck. Seeing a dead deer in a dream indicates the problems you face and your fears about them. As for a woman who dreams that she is eating deer meat, this is evidence that she will be exposed to treachery and treachery. Interpretation of a dream about a deer in a woman’s dream Pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees this spinner in a dream, and her appearance is beautiful, then it is good that she will give birth to a very beautiful girl. Dreaming about the presence of a deer in the dream also indicates that this woman will give birth easily. As for seeing a wandering deer, it is evidence of exhaustion during childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about a deer in a man’s dream indicates A beautiful-looking deer in a dream indicates positive changes in the dreamer’s life. As for seeing a deer in a dream, this is a sign of unpleasant events that the dreamer is going through. Add the dream that you want to interpret with reference to the family situation in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of Abraham, peace be upon him, in a dream: Seeing the Prophet Abraham in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of our Master Abraham for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, the interpretation of the name Abraham by Ibn Sirin, and more. Interpretation of a dream about Abraham by Ibn Sirin. Seeing our Master Abraham, peace be upon him, in a dream means goodness, sustenance, and blessing that the dreamer will receive in wakefulness. His vision also shows that the dreamer has many qualities And good qualities, such as his ability to endure, altruism, and sacrifice, and that this person can offer the most precious thing he has on earth as a gift to God Almighty. Also, seeing God’s friend Abraham, peace be upon him, in a dream may indicate that the dreamer enjoins good and forbids evil. If the dreamer is a father And he has children, then his vision shows his compassion and love for his children. If he is single, then the vision indicates that he will marry a good woman in the near future. Seeing him in a dream means the calamity and adversity that the dreamer will face, but he will succeed in overcoming and resolving these adversities. Seeing our master Abraham in a dream means that we We leave our family and loved ones and move away from them in order to devote ourselves to worshiping God and for the dreamer to leave corrupt friends and companions in reality and come closer to God Almighty through worship. For him. And the Mujahid who sees in his dream our Master Abraham, peace be upon him, nicknamed the Friend of God, his vision shows victory and victory over his enemies. Whoever sees that our Master Abraham called him and the dreamer responded to his call and went to him, then this situation indicates the status and high status that is given to the dreamer in his reality. Whoever saw That Abraham, peace be upon him, called him and the dreamer did not answer him, or that our Master Abraham was angry with the dreamer, then the vision shows the dreamer’s failure to perform the Hajj obligation despite his presence. The ability to do it. Whoever sees in his dream that he held the body or the clothes that our master Abraham wore in a dream, then his vision shows the status of this dreamer with God Almighty and that he is the food of God’s love. In another saying, it was reported that this vision indicates the success that will be given to the pioneer so that he can Performing the Hajj obligation. And whoever suffers from distress and worry in reality, if he sees our Master Abraham in his dream, his vision indicates the collapse of that worry and a change in his condition for the better so that he can live in happiness and enjoyment. The woman or girl who sees our Master Abraham, peace be upon him, in her dream has different situations. If she This woman or girl is not married, then her vision indicates marriage soon. If she is married and has children, then the vision shows the misfortune that will befall one of her children, which will soon leave him. If the woman is childless or does not have children, then her vision indicates that she will give birth soon. Whoever sees In his dream that he became the Prophet of God Abraham, peace be upon him, the dream indicates the distress and calamity that befalls this dreamer from his enemies, but he is victorious from them. If this fortuneteller is suitable for occupying high positions, he will have a high status and high rule. Whoever saw in his dream that his appearance became like that of Our Master Abraham, or that he put on some of his clothes, then the dream indicates the misery that the dreamer will fall into in his real life. And those who commit sins and disobedience, especially those who are negligent in performing their duties.
